    • Constructor Detail

      • Job

        public Job(java.lang.String n,
   java.lang.Long i,
   java.sql.Date f)
        Default Constructor to create an abstract job that can be run on a processor.
        Parameters:
        n - the name of this Job.
        i - the interval in ms between executions of this Job.
        f - the Date of this job's first execution.
